sobre.title: R.U.M.O - About us
sobre.intro_text: R.U.M.O (Unified Network of Mobility and Orientation) was created with the objective of offering comprehensive support to immigrants arriving in Brazil, facilitating their adaptation and integration into society. Our mission is to help with document regularization, ensure understanding of Brazilian laws, and open opportunities for employment and professional training, so that they can build a new future in the country. The platform also offers information about rights, such as legal assistance, health and other essential resources. In addition, we have locators, converters and updated news to keep immigrants well-informed about everything they need to live with security and dignity in Brazil. We believe that safe and informed integration is fundamental to building a more inclusive society, where everyone can participate actively and have access to the opportunities they deserve.
